^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

FanTest.description: A reference to the fan test for this chassis.
FanTest.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a reference to the resource that represents the chassis fan test.

LeakIndicatorActive.description: Signifies active status of the Leak Indicator LED.
LeakIndicatorActive.longDescription: Signifies active status of the Leak Indicator LED.

PowerRestorePolicy.description: The desired power state of the eRDHx when power is restored after a power loss.

ResetIndicatorActive.description: Signifies active status of the Reset Indicator LED.
ResetIndicatorActive.longDescription: Signifies active status of the Reset Indicator LED.

enumDescriptions.AlwaysOff: Power state of the eRDHx when power is restored will be OFF
enumDescriptions.AlwaysOn: Power state of the eRDHx when power is restored will be ON
enumDescriptions.LastState: Power state of the eRDHx when power is restored will be same as LastState
